layout.drivetrain: Transverse front engine, all wheel drive

engine.swap: JDM 6-bolt 4G63T (92 Galant VR4 70k original km) swap done by Kinetic Motorsport

intake.intercooler: Kinetic Motorsport DSM 2g Race FMIC kit (24"x12"x3.5")

forced_induction.turbocharger: Forced Performance DSM FP3052 Ball Bearing turbo w/ driver side elbow (GT3076r)

oil_delivery.drain: Forced Performance Blue Oil Drain Tube

forced_induction.water_injection: AEM 1 Gallon Water/Methanol Injection Kit (AEM Part# 30-3000)

exhaust.manifold: Forced Performance DSM Race Manifold w/ Bronze Coating (D5S Ni-Resist Turbine housing material)
exhaust.o2_housing: Forced Performance Custom 3" SS O2 Housing Recirculated
exhaust.downpipe: Kinetic Motorsport 3" SS Downpipe w/ flex coupling
exhaust.catback: Kinetic Motorsport 3" Mandrel Bent SS Full catback + resonator + 2nd o2 sensor extension welded in
exhaust.resonator: Vibrant Performance Bottle Style Resonator 3"/4" x 18" T304 Stainless Steel

fuel_system.injectors: 4x Rochester type injectors of unknown size (~680cc)

electronics.engine_mgmt: AEM EMS Programmable Engine Management Systems (AEM Part# 30-1310)
electronics.map_sensor: AEM 3.5 BAR / 50 PSIa MAP Stainless Steel Sensor Kit (AEM Part# 30-2130-50)
electronics.iat_sensor: AEM Air Inlet Temperature Sensor Kit (AEM Part# 30-2010)
electronics.boost_controller: AEM Boost Control Solenoid Kit (AEM Part# 30-2400)
electronics.alternator: GM/Saturn 96A alternator (1993-99 Saturn SC series with DOHC engine)
electronics.alternator_relocation: Jay Racing Alternator Relocation Kit for 2G DSM w/ aluminum main bracket

cooling.radcap: GReddy 1.3 bar Rad Cap Type S

current_specs.transmission: 5 speed manual rebuilt by Kinetic Motorsport w/ all brand new synchros

drivetrain.clutch: Kinetic Motorsport Performance Clutch Kit Stage 2 (ACT2600)
drivetrain.clutch_hydraulics: Techna-Fit SS Braided Clutch Line (Master to Slave)

suspension.engine_mounts: Prothane High Performance Urethane Motor Mounts Kit 2g

brakes.type: Stoptech Brakes Kit SP40 (4 piston Front Calipers)
brakes.rotors: AEM Big Break Kit Slotted Rotors
AEM Big Break Kit Slotted Rotors

interior.wrap: Re-wrapped vinyl interior in a red and black color scheme (Wrapped by Trim-Up) - both front seats - rear seats - driver and passenger side door panels - rear quarter panels - middle center console - black fabric ceiling and floor carpet
interior.steering_wheel: Steering wheel and airbag cover is replaced with a Mitsubishi one

body_conversion.front_bumper: eclipse front bumper conversion (custom modified 2gb OEM bumper)
body_conversion.headlights: Angel Eyes Halo Projectors (2gb eclipse / black housing)

exterior.hid: Philips 6000K HID kit Philips LVQ 212 - L300 ballast D2S type 35W bulb
exterior.bonnet: Carbon fibre hood OEM style 2gb eclipse

speakers.rear: Clarion SRR6986 6" x 9" Bidirectional Glass-Fiber Woofer Cone coaxial 2-way 350W

current_specs.weight_reduction: - a/c delete - cruise control delete - non cruise control throttle cable installed
current_specs.security: CompuStar 2W8000FMR Series 2 way paging alarm with autostart and turbo timer

fluids.clutch: ATE Super Blue (DOT4) High Performance Brake Fluid
